import React,{useContext} from 'react' import { userTracker } from '../context/userTracker' import { useState } from 'react' import axios from "axios" import {Link,useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' const EditProfile = () => { //user tracker const {currentUser,setCurrentUser} = useContext(userTracker) const [inputs,setInputs] = useState({ username:"", }) console.log(inputs) //function to handle change in input const handleChange = e => { setInputs(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } const handleApply = async e => { try{ //when call goes through const res = await axios.post("http://localhost:8800/edit/edituser",[inputs,currentUser]) console.log(res) navigate("/login") }catch(err) { //when theres an error console.log(err) } } return(
